description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Travels to the Source of the Missouri River and across the American Continent to the Pacific Ocean, performed by order of the Government of the United States in the years 1804, 1805, and 1806. By Captains Lewis and Clarke. Published from the official report, and illustrated by ... maps. [Another edition of “History of the Expedition under the command of Captains Lewis and Clarke, etc.” By Nicholas Biddle. Edited by T. Reus.]" Author: LEWIS, Meriwether. Contributor: BIDDLE, Nicholas - LL.D Contributor: Clark, William Contributor: REES, Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 982.i.17.", "British Library HMNTS 145.e.6." Page: 16 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1814 Publisher: Longman & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002157286 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
